quote: The thing about meditation is: You become more and more you.
author: David Lynch

quote: Quiet the mind, and the soul will speak.
author: Ma Jaya Sati Bhagavati

quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
author: Buddha

quote: Meditation is not evasion; it is a serene encounter with reality.
author: Thích Nhất Hạnh

quote: The soul always knows what to do to heal itself. The challenge is to silence the mind.
author: Caroline Myss

quote: Meditation can help us embrace our worries, our fear, our anger; and that is very healing.
author: Thích Nhất Hạnh

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: The act of meditation is being spacious.
author: Sogyal Rinpoche

quote: Meditation is a vital way to purify and quiet the mind, thus rejuvenating the body.
author: Deepak Chopra
